price: Sọ pé: “Tí ó bá jẹ́ pé Allāhu bá fẹ́ ni, èmi ìbá tí lè ké al-Ƙur’ān fún yín, àti pé Allāhu ìbá tí fi ìmọ̀ rẹ̀ mọ̀ yín. Mo kúkú ti lo àwọn ọdún kan láààrin yín ṣíwájú (ìsọ̀kalẹ̀) rẹ̀, ṣé ẹ ò ṣe làákàyè ni?”
arabic: قُل لَّوۡ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ مَا تَلَوۡتُهُۥ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَلَآ أَدۡرَىٰكُم بِهِۦۖ فَقَدۡ لَبِثۡتُ فِيكُمۡ عُمُرٗا مِّن قَبۡلِهِۦٓۚ أَفَلَا تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qul law shāa al-lahu mā talawtuhu ʿalaykum walā adrākum bihi faqad labith'tu fīkum ʿumuran min qablihi afalā taʿqilūna
translations: He (would) have made it known to you
He (would) have made it known to you
